Menu
Class MenuTemplate

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      Menu.MenuTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameOverMenu, InGameMenu, LeaderboardMenu, LoginMenu, MainMenu
public abstract class MenuTemplate
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The MenuTemplate class is used by other menus for their appearance. Methods from JFrame are inherited to be used in this class.

See Also:
Serialized Form
